item.title: Spam thread
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:28, topic:215893”][quote author=Niall link=topic=283737.msg2303264#msg2303264 date=1214716942]

not if you are completely fucking retarded frell

Fixe-- wait same thing.

Honestly, i don’t think io9 and frank can post in one of my topics without using the word fuck or retard.

Honestly, who can blame them? The FIRST result in google I got for “java fullscreen” was this, and it took just 1 more search to find this. I’m not being nasty or anything, but if you can’t be asked to use google, then don’t bother posting here, it’s fine posting here with errors but for something google can answer with 2 search terms you deserve everything you get frankly. (No, pun wasn’t intended)

i love how
rather than warn us for abusing frell, niall helps out
[/quote]
Pretty much why i have refrained from posting questions here for some time. Then when i post something i made, and there isn’t a page of question threads from me, people think i didn’t make it.[/quote]fuck twat lolololloloololoo retard

Read full topic

item.title: Spam thread
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:24, topic:215893”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=283737.msg2303234#msg2303234 date=1214714492]

What’s the point of having a Java Programming section if you can tell the guy who asks to simply Google it?

because some questions that get asked here are exactly the kind that can be answered by google,

here at Java Programming, we have two main ideas regarding this

  1. Human brainpower is a valuable resource
  2. It should not be wasted with trivial stuff, but saved for good, thought-provoking questions

therefore, if someone asks a stupid question, we dont waste brainpower on it, we just tell them a way for them to find out for themselves,

so TeleNubby, shut the fuck up and read this
dont expect to be spoonfed my friend,
[/quote]I don’t expect to be spoonfed, and hell I’d ignore anyone who would attempt at spoonfeeding me. I just personally believe one person telling the kid to Google it and leave the topic how it is is enough. There’s no need for this shit (just about everything after Tree’s post).

You cant blame io9 about that, thats how he is.

And yakman, human resource? If its a simple google - dont reply.
But on a regular basis: fuck twat lolololloloololoo retard[/quote]
If its a simple google - dont reply [size=99pt]DONT FUCKING POST IT, FUCKWIT[/size].

Read full topic
